pos review: Room 511 is the smallest on that floor nice view, breakfast was nice but not included extra fee, neighborhood is great in the middle of everything, the room was tiny even for a new hotel that is trying to be ultra hip, the welcome glass of cava is a nice touch. Contemporary art in public spaces
neg review: Small rooms with minimal closet space

pos review: Location was excellent. All areas in Antwerp were reachable by foot in a few minutes. Breakfast was ok, although there was not too much no choice. Clean and comfortable. Slept well.
neg review: Nothing negative to say. Breakfast could be more selective.

pos review: Breakfast was great . Location perfect, very clean friendly staff would recommend
neg review: Lights in room could be better

pos review: The location was great and the facilities were very clean. The room was light and bright.

neg review:
Breakfast Average .. no FREE choice but good products 
Rooms are small ..

pos review: Prosecco at check-in and the happy hour appetizers and drinks is GREAT!! Room are modern/industrial styled. Great location, great staff, great hotel! My third time staying here and I love it.
Drinks and snacks offered and friendly staff
neg review: Not enough room to unpack clothes.
